div.p: JOIN US TOMORROW NIGHT AT 11:00, MADELEINE ALBRIGHT.
>> Jon: I THINK I'M IN LOVE WITH YOU PEOPLE.
VERY FEW CROWDS WILL WHOOO A FORMER SECRETARY OF STATE.
(CHEERS AND APPLAUSE) HERE IT IS, YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
HE ADMITTED EATING DOG WHEN HE WAS GROWING UP IN INDONESIA AND GRASSHOPPERS,
AND I DIDN'T MAKE THAT UP.
>> SEAN, YOU KNOW, I'M GOING TO TALK ABOUT JOBS AND THE
